author: Special Correspondent
text: Southern Railway will be operating special trains from Chennai to clear the extra rush of passengers in the first week of April. A press release said train no. 06001 will leave Egmore at 8.20 p.m. on April 4 for Tirunelveli and reach the next day at 9.45 a.m. It will travel on the Villupuram –Trichy– Madurai route. Train no. 06004 will leave Chennai Central for Ernakulam junction at 6.20 p.m. on April 7 and reach the next day at 7.40 a.m. The train will pass through Jolarpettai, Coimbatore and Palakkad. Train no. 06007 will leave Central for Mangaluru at 1 p.m. on April 7 and in the return direction, train no. 06008 will leave Mangaluru at 10.45 a.m. Advance reservations for these trains will begin on Thursday.
title: Special trains to Tirunelveli, Ernakulam, Mangaluru in April
